title: Now that Zoe got gutted move on to the next core issue of the game.
body:
Let's discuss how my champion goes throught an aut----attack in the middle of 7 minnions... Thus making me spin as if i'm a fkn lvl 13 Garen and getting me killed!
Or better yet when i lose out on a kill because 4 minnions are thicker than Cho at 20stacks.

replies.body:
{{champion:31}} {{item:3070}} 

Minions should slow instead of making pathfinding go berserk.
